article.title: AFCEA
article.author: SIGNAL Staff
article.text: Contact AFCEA Meet the SIGNAL Connections Staff Contact and biographical information about the journalists behind every issue of SIGNAL Magazine and SIGNAL Connections.The Association Advantage AFCEA enables you to expand your knowledge and professional network through interaction with communications, electronics, intelligence and information systems experts and decision makers worldwide. Find out how.How to Submit Material for SIGNAL Connections AFCEA Interactive Planning Calendar Search the Web calendar for AFCEA events such as conferences, chapter meetings and courses that relate to defense, communications, information technology, security and intelligence.
